website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof outdoor clock that is tough enough for all types of weather and blends in with any decor.
pros: Large clock with contrasting colors for easy reading
Continuous motion of the minute hand makes for quiet operation
cons: Occasional reports of inaccurate temperature readings

customer_reviews.title: Check the "Finish".  One does not have sweeping seconds hand.
customer_reviews.text: I got the clock for the patio facing the west. Received the one without sweeping seconds hand because I did not notice the difference when ordering. I'm lucky because I tend to obsess over the accuracy of the clock (to the second)! The face is large so it's easy to read. Thermometer and hygrometer seem accurate enough; I have not seen two hygrometers giving the same reading. Recommend that you check the two finishes to see which one has the sweep second hand. Otherwise I hope that it will survive the desert heat outdoors and last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Niravana

customer_reviews.title: I like the construction being waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 18” Large Outdoor Wall Clock ,I like the construction being waterproof, it’s functions (time/temp/humidity) and it looks great . We hung the clock on our deck, so when we’re enjoying the out-of-doors we can keep tract of time, it is easy to read from across the yard. We had some friends over and they commented on how they liked the look of the clock. I would recommend this clock to family and friends. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clocks looks very good and works great
customer_reviews.text: Clocks looks very good and works great. We wanted a clock that will hang on our covered patio by our pol so we were looking for a clock that has the batteries covered so the would not corrode. When we found this clock, it states: "Covered batteries offers protection from the elements" When we received this clock, we found that the batteries attached to the back with no cover of any kind. We know that the battery holder will corrode and ruin the clock because it happened to the last "outdoor clock" that we purchased. We were disappointed. Contacted company and they sent a new battery cover to us. Works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Dave Benton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read clock
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clock large numbers makes it easy to read from pool. I purchased this cock because it was weather proof and was very large for patio and pool area. I like to know time in pool and with this clock you can read the time from the far side of the pool. No clicking seconds off this clock has a continuous moving minute hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.    jmatlosz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Perfect Time
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the SkyNature Outdoor Clock would not be large enough to see, but it turned out to be the perfect size. Keeps good time with no problems. Goes with the rest of my outdoor leisure time things hanging on the side of my shed. We have a little over 5 acres and when my husband goes out to cut the grass he likes to be able to look and see what time it is when he goes past the shed with the clock on it. We have a large commercial lawn mower and it takes him about 2-21/2 hrs. to cut. The clock keeps him "on track" with the time.
customer_reviews.author: Natures Scape

customer_reviews.title: Amended review:
customer_reviews.text: Update: (change to star rating) SkyNature customer service contacted me and sent a new movement. It has been installed and (so far) is keeping the time. They were prompt & courteous- the shipping took a little time-I’m glad that it’s up & running! Old review: Looks very nice. I bought this as a Father’s Day gift and it kept time for about 1 week. I have put several new batteries in it and it only keeps time for about 3 hours. I’d love to return it, but since I bought it over a month before Father’s Day, I’m out of luck. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rpz

customer_reviews.title: Second hand missing
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on pool house. Easy to read from both sides of large pool. Clock difficult to set accurately as there is only one thumb screw to ser both hours and minutes. The second hand is just totally missing. Humidity gauge too small to see. There is just one small area to hang the clock on a screw or nail. Not sure that is enough to keep the clock stable in ocean winds. Too soon to gauge durability in salt air. It’s only been hanging 2 weeks. Attractive and easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love the looks of this clock
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this clock. I hung it outside by the patio and everything is easy to see from a distance and it keeps good time. I always worry about clocks blowing off the wall in a wind storm wind as this has happened to me in the past with other clocks. I did tie it down better so hopefully this won't happen. I hope this clock will last more than one year as it appears stronger and considered an outdoor clock.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Big nice clock
customer_reviews.text: I need a big wall clock for my big living room, so I purchased this clock. After I opened the package, I found it is bigger than I expected, which is good for my empty wall. The clock is as same as the product picture. There are hygrometer and thermometer on the panel for you to check humidity and temperature. Both front panel and battery housing have sealing strips, I guess that is why they claim the clock is weatherproof. Pro: Good quality. Nice clock for a big room. No second arm, so it is super quite. Came in with a small hanger. Hygrometer and Thermometer. Con: The package does not include a AA battery.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Served well for 15 months - climate rough on it I guess
customer_reviews.text: Liked this clock a lot. Easy to read from a distance. Not sure about the accuracy of the humidity readings, but seemed to go up when it felt humid. Temperature okay, though. But, it slowed way down after 15 months, even with a new battery. I changed the battery once prior. Tropical climate gets a lot of things here. I was tempted to just buy another one, but the price has gone up $15 since Feb 2018 when I bought it. Buying another one that seems to have okay ratings at the same price as for this one when I originally bought it. We'll see how that one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: MrEye

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Received the clock right on time as promised. It looks great and it was easy to hang. We use ours outside by the pool and hung it underneath a small overhang which protects it from the majority of the sunshine (and maybe from some of the rain). I think the temperature reading may be a little high, but the priority is knowing the time. We've only been using it for a couple of weeks, so I can't comment yet on the long-term weatherproof aspect, but we love this clock so far.
customer_reviews.author: JKK in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our pool area and so farm all is well. It gets full sun for about 6 hours then shade in the afternoon. The sun doesn't seem to have adversely affected it in any way. It is easy for me to read from inside the pool which is nice, so I can time myself exercising. The second hand is nice when the kids want you to time them! Overall this has been a great purchase for us! I recommend this clock.
customer_reviews.author: mommy

customer_reviews.title: 365 day quality guarantee against defective parts - Doesn't exist.
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months the humidity and temperature features on the clock ceased to function...an important feature if you live in the Desert. After several attempts to communicate with the seller via Amazon, I finally got a response from Customer Service. They agreed that the clock was covered by their warranty, and sent out a replacement. The new clock arrived with the humidity needle broken off; now I have two broken clocks. There has been no response after several emails to resolve this issue. Total silence. I can't recommend this product, or their Customer Service. Update: We received a new functioning clock and are grateful for the effort to satisfy our concerns. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R. Baki

customer_reviews.title: "Time" will tell!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the SkyNature Outdoor Clock to use out by our pool. It is large enough to read from every angle, and was easy to hang. We live in the desert where the temperatures have been 100 degrees and higher during the day. We needed a clock that's mechanisms would NOT melt at these daily high temperatures like the two other clocks we have used in the past. Whatever controls the hands seems to melt and the clock is no longer usable. We have only had this clock for just over a week, so I guess "time will tell" if it's the right clock for our hot summers!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Clock
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy to read and so far accurate clock. I cannot attest to it being waterproof as we have it hanging on our covered Lanai. I like the way that it looks. Clock, humidity and temperature are all easy to read. Obviously, only having it about 3 weeks I can’t say how durable it will be but at this price point it should last awhile. We previously had a big box clock, same application, that lasted for over 8 years before the face started to lift. Hopefully, this one will preform as well if not longer. At this point would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pool area.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for. At first I thought it would be too large and I was focusing my search on a 12 inch clock. I received a valued opinion however that assured me it would work in my space. She was right. It is attractive, easy to read and not too large. I have already had positive comments on this clock and been asked where it was purchased. I love that it is not only a clock, but will give me temperature and humidity also.
customer_reviews.author: Hunters

customer_reviews.title: If the clock stops, check this first.
customer_reviews.text: This may be helpful for future buyers: The clock appeared to have stopped working the day after we put it up. I tested the battery, and it was fine. While attempting to reset the time, I noticed that the minute hand was too close to the face, and was getting hung up on the thermometer dial. It was easy to bend it slightly away from the face. Could happen to anybody, and would be something for you to mention if you get any complaints about the clock not working.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Donovan VMD

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: The clock looks great and was easy to hang. Not sure the temperature or humidity were really accurate, but the time was accurate and easy to read. I gave 1 star cause it only worked for 2 MONTHs! The big hand became loose and just hangs down pointing at the 6 We tried a new battery, but the big hand just dangles loosely and cant be controlled. Wish it lasted more than 2 months! I just read reviews that were just like mine-why is this product still on Amazon? So many bad reviews of this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Regan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the clock purchase
customer_reviews.text: As we just installed an inground pool this year, I wanted the ability to see the temperature and humidity in my yard. Also having a big easy to read clock was a bonus. The clock is installed under a big open overhang, so it is not in the sun and is shielded from bad weather. We love the way it looks as it matches the ceiling fans and lighting under the overhang. We have found that both the temperature and hygrometer are a bit off from local weather reports. I'm not sure which one is accurate. Overall we are very happy with the purchase and quality of the clock. It's hard to believe this runs on one AA battery.
customer_reviews.author: J Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to see!
customer_reviews.text: The first clock worked for 5 days then died. Amazon replaced the detective clock without a hassle as is usually the case with returns on Amazon. So far (3 weeks) the second clock is working well. My only complaint is that the temperature and humidity dials are so small that they are difficult to read from a distance, especially in proportion to the clock dial, which is fine from a distance. Were the thermometer and hygrometer dials a bit larger, and had the first clock not been defective, I'd have given this clock 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ventura Joe - Florida

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't keep time.
customer_reviews.text: The second hand stops and will start again if you tap on the face near it. However, at this point, the time is incorrect, and you have to take the clock off the wall, and work with it. Totally inconvenient, and a waste of money. The nice aspects are that it is lightweight and attractive, but alas, the main aspect about a clock is keeping accurate time. It may not be weatherproof and perhaps, this is why it can't keep time. Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Luise

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay running
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Stopped working immediately. Seller said get better batteries. I did. Still stopped working. Seller said can we send you a new clock. I said yes. That was months ago. No clock. I said I will give you another chance to rectify otherwise I will have to leave the negative review. Still no clock 4 months later. Very sad. It was a beautiful clock for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Haley

customer_reviews.title: Fogs up- but customer service gave refund
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be an outdoor clock, but the inside fogs up so bad in the summer with humidity that you can barely tell the time. Also the Temp and Humidity gage doesn't seem to be very accurate at all. After submitting this review however they reached out to me and offered a refund. So customer service gives it a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for the backyard!
customer_reviews.text: We are redecorating our backyard this year and wanted to add a nice clock to our sitting area. This clock had the nice classic appearance with the bronze trim and classic easy to ready numbers. Another nice feature about this clock is the temperature and humidity gauge built in. The biggest deal for me is if the clock keeps accurate time. Nothing is more annoying then having to keep taking a clock down to correct the time. This clock has kept correct time so far and we are overly pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Floppy Hour Hand
customer_reviews.text: After having this clock for less than a year, the second hand no longer moves. When we removed it to see why the hour hand swayed back and forth. Opened it up and tried to secure the hour hand, but only after a few days, it was still floppy. Great looking clock, but if it only is correct at the hours of 6 AM and 6 PM, not worth it to us.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Ptak

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous looking clock we purchased for our Pool. It hangs on the inside of the door when we're not using it and when we open the door it faces outward. The main display is easy to read from across the pool and you can see the hands on the RH and Temp, but not the numbers, however, as we get more familiar with the dial, we'll be able to estimate that. The clock isn't fully exposed to weather, but that shouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Davies

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This clock was bought to hang on our back porch. I recently received a notice to not hang in direct sunlight due to curling of the backing on the clock face, I assume. Fortunately the spot we’ve chosen gets mostly shade. I have not had it long enough to rate it’s reliability or longevity so rating is a 4 star. It is easy to read except for the smaller temp / barometer gauges which is ok. It goes well with our exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Sweengolly

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Clock
customer_reviews.text: The SkyNature Outdoor Clock arrived in a timely fashion and there was no damage in shipping. We have owed MANY outdoor clocks over the years and none have lasted for more than a year - frustrating. The clock is beautiful - looks great on our deck and keeps great time and temperature - we have another thermometer in different part of our yard and clock thermometer is always in sync with it. We haven't had clock for an extended period of time but judging from the quality of the clock we are anticipating that it will last for many years. Would definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: gloria knox

customer_reviews.title: Cheap mechanical clock movement.
customer_reviews.text: Had to tap (hard) the clock movement on 2 occasions to get it to start/run. It is very obvious that the cheapest (plastic) mechanical movement was used for the clock movement. Its also obvious that the movement will need to be replaced in the future. If your not mechanically inclined to do that I would stay away from purchase. Other than that we liked the unit.
customer_reviews.author: deede56

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: Just received this clock a week or two ago, so I can't really speak to durability. Also, it is undercover and I live in the desert, so water resistance is not a factor! But it is a nice looking clock--not frilly or elaborate--but forthright and solid. It was easy to put in the batteries and the battery case had a nice big protective cover. It was easy to hang because of the built in hanging lip on the back. And it is BIG and easy to read all the way from the pool!!
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Everything it was described to be. I’m very pleased with its appearance and, thus far, it appears to be keeping accurate time. It is hanging in a covered porch so, theoretically, it is protected from the weather, but, we’ve had like 80% humidity everyday this summer so it might as well be raining on the porch and I’ve seen no evidence of moisture intrusion. Time will tell...lol...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Clock performs well after a few weeks of service here.
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this clock for our covered porch location near pool, after reading so many poor patio clock reviews on other models. Clock arrived in good shape and well packed. Seems accurate on time, temperature and humidity, so far. Very legible numerals. We hope for continued good, long service.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wendell S. Truggmann, III

customer_reviews.title: large pretty clock
customer_reviews.text: I`m new to USA and need a lot of things in my house. This product is great outdoor clock. It looks good on my wall. Easy to see and keeps correct time. it is also easy to set. I like it, and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ramazan

customer_reviews.title: Clock lasted less than a year in AZ heat but seller replaced quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Clock lasted for exactly 1 year in Arizona Sun. Worked well until it didn't. This is what the face looked like after less than one summer outside. Seller immediately replaced with minimal/no fuss even after return window had long expired. Very good, honest seller. Can't give clock 5 stars, but can definitely give seller 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: thebabydoc

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive
customer_reviews.text: We received our clock and Thermometer in the time frame expected and were very happy with the look. It is large and easy to read from a distance as many are not. We are happy with the accuracy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieg

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CLOCK! Easy to read. Truly weather proof. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: karen k

customer_reviews.title: Above excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this very nice, sturdy looking clock for our outdoor space which is under roof but open to the yard. Unfortunately the second hand kept sticking so I sent it right back to the seller immediately sent out a replacement Which is already up on the wall. So far so good, thank you so very much for your excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: L. Matossian

customer_reviews.title: An absolute work of art.
customer_reviews.text: This clock is far more attractive than in the photos. It’s huge and the copper bronze finish is very Tuscan. Super easy to read from across the yard. Looks great hanging outside by the pool. If it remains weather proof it will be a 10 star clock. Time will tell (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to set
customer_reviews.text: I had an atomic outdoor clock that just wouldn’t update during daylight savings. A pain to manually set. This one has a basic manual dial for setting. After almost 2 months running outdoors, it is still accurate. My only complaint is that the face paper is a bit warped in one section. I hope it doesn’t get more pronounced over time.
customer_reviews.author: itsDane

customer_reviews.title: It's really Waterproof!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered adifferent outdoor clock from Amazon before I found this one. It was supposed to be waterproof...it wasn't. How can an outdoor clock not be waterproof??? Anyway found this one and I love it! Works great, looks great and yes it's actually waterproof!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I could easily give this 5 stars but the thermometer is not accurate. It’s off on the high side by 10F, saying it’s 95 when it’s 85. The clock is in the shade as the roof overhang creates shade. Don’t feel like returning and trying another. I should but too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Z.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clock, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the clock so much I ordered 3, 4 in total for our country club in SWFL. Great price, really look sharp, 2 fit in custom golf time boards and look so sophisticated. Nice to have the temperature and humidity, too. One poolside and one near the tennis courts. We definitely need the Outdoor feature as ours are outside in the sun, heat and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I like that it had a thermometer in the clock. Very nice looking and easy to read. I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 because the paper inside the clock that the numbers are written on was bubbled. I sent that one back and got a different one. It was the same but not as bad. Barely notice on the 2nd one, so I kept it. Since the clock is outside I hope it doesn't get worse from the moisture. Only had it for a few days and nice weather so not sure yet.
customer_reviews.author: retired

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Your request for meaningful feedback is premature. At least wait 30 days; six months or a year would be better. While this product seems to receive good reviews, the negative criticism seems to focus on a short life span. Given that information, I choose to wait before offering a serious evaluation. However, the product did arrive promptly, is easy to set and install, has an appearance as promised, and so far (two weeks) has kept accurate time. Feel free to inquire again after a more appropriate test period. Cannot comment about weatherproofing. It hasn't been exposed to rain yet.
customer_reviews.author: Barry E Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Not to my standard
customer_reviews.text: In the unit I received, the hygrometer and thermometer aren't really useful since you have to calibrate them yourself and they are given to easy messing up of that calibration. I returned my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Russell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work :/
customer_reviews.text: Although it’s pretty, I have changed the batteries and I have tried Energizer and Duracell. The thermometer and the clock are not accurate. Had a clock in the same spot outside for years and it never missed a beat :/
customer_reviews.author: MultiMom

customer_reviews.title: Large and easy to read from the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Hung it poolside. Helps track the time if I swim laps. Bonus that it tells the temperature, and it appears to be accurate. It is in a protected area, so weatherproofing is not important. It did not melt on a hot day in Tucson anyway,.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Clock
customer_reviews.text: We live in SW Fla where it is hot and humid in the summer. We had an outdoor clock on our covered pool patio that stopped working outside, but worked fine inside. This new outdoor clock replaced it and works great. No problems with heat and humidity. Plus the temperature and humidity readings match our weather station. Also, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin M Keen

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous click for our patio. The quality and design stands out. I bought it for the patio but my husband wanted it in the house because it was so beautiful. Since he wanted the humidity information we went ahead and hung it on the patio. It is a stunning piece.
customer_reviews.author: Denny S. Coats

customer_reviews.title: not weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: This is an outdoor clock, therefore we though it could be in direct sunlight. Sure wish they had said that on the information for this clock. I would not have bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Cretsinger

customer_reviews.title: Not running well
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this clock in mid June. We absolutely love it and get lots of compliments on it. A few days ago it stopped running. My husband reset it and it worked for a day or so. I gave a low rating because it ran for less than two months. It periodically stops running. Apparently the second hand is the culprit. We have the clock outside by the pool. We do water aerobics daily so I use the second hand for timing my exercises. I’m hoping I’ll be contacted and maybe get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: beth fulghom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to read!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, large clock that I have hanging on the backside of our house. I was looking for a clock that was easy to read from a distance of about 100' so, when I'm out working in the yard, I can keep track of the time. The fact that it also has the temperature and humidity is a bonus. I purchased it six months ago and it has been hanging outside every since. Still looks beautiful and is very accurate. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: June E. Coon

customer_reviews.title: I really like they way it looks
customer_reviews.text: The clock looks great and so far is working reliably. I do not see any issues in terms of reliability and build quality. The clock is hanging on the fence under California sun and so far it is working. If it stops working, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Pesochinskiy

customer_reviews.title: Good if it doesn't break in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This clock was fine. I actually got this to replace the exact same clock that I had ordered in November 2019. Unfortunately we through away that box and afterward noticed that the temperature hand was broken off. We had to eat the cost of it as we had no way to return it since it was not in its original box. We glued on the hand, but it did not work for temperature anyway. So that was unfortunate, since we paid about 120 dollars for a 60 dollar clock since we could not get a refund and had to order 2 of them
customer_reviews.author: Leon Stanislav

customer_reviews.title: Pretty clock
customer_reviews.text: Pretty clock. Works well so far but only after I received it did I read it shouldn’t be put in direct sunlight. That’s a problem since I wanted to put it on the side of my house facing our pool so I could time myself in the water. Hope it continues to work in spite of direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: fernem

customer_reviews.title: Good Company!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the clock, however it didn't last in Houston, TX area; had clock in direct sun so highly recommend you don't hang in similar location. Hands got loose and stopped turning. HOWEVER; Great company to work with. they reached out regarding my 2 Star review to offer replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Temperature
customer_reviews.text: Although a beautiful clock, I was quite disappointed with the temperature sensor as it was not working. I contacted the company asking for assistance. They text me information how to recalculate but it’s still off!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Choate

customer_reviews.title: 18" clock
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with it when it first arrived. The second hand would get caught on the minute hand and stop. After trying several times to fix it I finally cut the second hand in half. Clock now works fine and hangs on the outside fireplace. Keeps good time and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Golden

customer_reviews.title: Large Face Easy to See
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of its large face which makes it very easy to read anywhere in my large backyard. Very attractive too. It has been up very over month now and is still running very accurately! yes I would recommend this if your looking for a large face clock.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: One Year Expiration Ugh
customer_reviews.text: One year later and it doesn't work. This is the second one where the hour hand no longer works... just hangs at #6. Tends to happen at the one year warranty point or Spring in Maryland. Disappointed again.
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Never Kept Time Properly
customer_reviews.text: Well, I waited a week too long to return this non-working clock. I kept trying different batteries... but it never kept time.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor weather proof clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. Exactly what I wanted. I had hoped it was bigger, but I can still read it from 50 feet out. Keeps great time. I’ve had it for a couple of months now and it’s still accurate to the minute.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Carden

customer_reviews.title: Good clock
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice clock and works well so far I have only had it two months and with weather related outdoor it takes time to see if it actually durable, so I can't attest to weather or not that is true but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock
customer_reviews.text: I just hung this clock outside today so I can't tell if it's waterproof but the battery is enclosed so hopefully there won't be a problem. The clock arrived on time, in excellent condition, and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful clock. The size is perfect, looks elegant and works great. I placed it outdoors on the wall near the pool, and so far so good. I'm not sure how it will hold up to heavy rain and sun as my wall has a bit of a roof overhang above it so it does not get to much direct sunlight or rain. But I suspect it would be fine, seems very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Rosi53

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a clock on my balcony that had broken due to exposure to high humidity and salt air. So far the temp and humidity gages seem to be working and it's a good-looking, quiet clock.
customer_reviews.author: pgbuzz

customer_reviews.title: WaterProof and Easy To Read
customer_reviews.text: I love my clock. I've had it since summer. It's easy to adjust the time, nice large numbers so it's easy to read from a distance. it keeps accurate time. Although it's plastic it does look bronze. I would have prefered bronze but for the price I'll settle for plastic.
customer_reviews.author: MrsFontenot

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!  Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on our lanai which is screened in. Nice wall decoration with added bonus of functionality. Pleasantly surprised that it keeps accurate time and temperature over the three weeks that we've had it. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't fallen off wall all summer, despite high winds and storms. Still keeping good time from original battery. Will take down for winter and look forward to using again next year. Very easy to read from the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Timzmom

customer_reviews.title: too soon
customer_reviews.text: It is not a good time to review this item as it all depends on THE RELIABLILTY AND PERFORMANCE OVER TIME. I find many products made in China just do not last more than one year. That to me is a big NEGATIVE. So at this time (just a few months), it looks nice and is still working. We will see in one year.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Mirer

customer_reviews.title: outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: displayed in your pool area ...is weather proof as it sits in direct open space...construcion is solid...well made
customer_reviews.author: Connie  Tarsook

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these clocks that have gone crazy after a little over 1 year. Will not be fooled again. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this clock. The time is right on, and it is big enough to see when outside playing in the pool. I'm not sure about the waterproof quite yet, so I gave 4 stars in that feature. The rest all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad. His last 2 outdoor clocks quit working. Based on the reviews, I got this one. So far, so good. It is easy to read from the pool. Happy with the purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: M. Witty

customer_reviews.title: Keeps perfect time
customer_reviews.text: The clock looks great it works perfectly might I suggest that you use a lithium battery the Texas heat will kill a normal battery also it is best to place out of direct sunlight because the temperature reading goes very high if it is left in direct sunlight
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE ALBERS

customer_reviews.title: Love This Clock
customer_reviews.text: This clock is really attractive and it keeps great time. We have it on our covered front porch and it looks great. I really appreciate the temperature and humidity features as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Could have bought a clock and thermometer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Should have brought a size smaller but it's a nice looking outdoor clock. Price was much higher than the one I had from At Home that fell and broke. This one is plastic, at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large outdoor clock/weather station
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock to have on the pool patio! This will help us to keep track of time and monitor sun exposure while having fun outdoors! I love the temperature and hygrometer features, too.
customer_reviews.author: ChaChaRDH

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be waterproof and beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: This clock is just what I was looking for. I can easily read it from in my pool and it is very pretty and the color goes well with my brick wall. It shows on their website the clock hanging outside exposed to the elements and so far the clock appears to be waterproof. Many clocks online claim to be indoor/outdoor but not waterproof. My clock is hanging outside on a wall only covered by a narrow overhang. Very pleased so far with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Owen

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one works great
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received only worked for about 5 mins. It would start working again if we moved it, then stop again after about 5 mins. Amazon exchange was super easy and the 2nd one has worked great. Love the waterproof feature as ours can get rained on. The size of it was perfect to be able to see the time from all parts of our pool. We've only had it a few days and will update as it weathers the summer being hung outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gilmorest

customer_reviews.title: Clock great, temperature gauge no good
customer_reviews.text: Great clock. Temperature gauge has never worked. No biggy to me i guess. I was really only buying it for the clock. Decent size i can read from anywhere around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT!
customer_reviews.text: HATE IT!! SECOND HAND RAN BACKWARDS!! covered the battery compartment with plastic wrap and it still didn't keep correct time!! worthless!~
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Beautil looking clock but malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking clock but temp and humidity gauges don't work When humidity 68% it show 32 and doesnt move When temp was 88 in the shade it shows 96 degrees bummer
customer_reviews.author: Tom D Heyen

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for outdoor patio
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking for an outdoor clock for quite some time. This one works great! We have strong winds that come through our backyard so we were afraid to put a clock up outside. However, this one is very sturdy with just the one hanging bracket and bolt into the bricks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love with antic designed wall clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch to present 🎁 it to my friend....she loved it very much.... love the model designed as an antic piece .... I have ordered metal color it looks very pretty....it also have hygrometer which can read humidity and also can read temperature..v can use it as outdoor wall clock because it is waterproof... and watch is very big can see the time easily from longer distance tooo...
customer_reviews.author: Sai Raghavendar

customer_reviews.title: Not really meant for outdoor use???
customer_reviews.text: I have this clock mounted on a wall outside on my patio and The hands fell off of the hygrometer and thermometer after about 6 months. Very disappointed. I really like the look of the clock and it keeps accurate time. Amazon only allows 60 days for returns so I guess I’m out of luck. Update - They reached out to me offering to refund my money. The customer service here is great!
customer_reviews.author: StevO

customer_reviews.title: Large, easy to read numbers, Battery protected for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: The clock is large and easy to read from a distance outdoors. It is the first outdoor clock we have had (and we go through a lot of them as we have very hot weather) that actually has the battery compartment sealed off and protected from the elements. It is also helpful to have the temperature and humidity info on there. Hoping it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The clock is mounted on the wall of the house ...
customer_reviews.text: The clock is mounted on the wall of the house. The humidity read about 10 - 15 % low. When the sun hits it directly the temperature goes wild. Other wise, the clock is attractive and that part works well
customer_reviews.author: Jake'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Outdoor Clock
customer_reviews.text: Clock was just as advertised and looks beautiful with my porch furniture. I haven’t had the clock for more than a few months, but it is working well so far. I live in Florida where we have humidity plus most of the year. I hope my new clock will continue to work as well as it has so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Waters

customer_reviews.title: It is working after several tries.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 5 days. Put in new battery. Worked for 2 hours. Update—waited a while and tried another battery from the same package. It worked. It had been working now for two weeks🤞🏻Hope it continues.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience
customer_reviews.text: Clock worked perfectly for two days, sporadically for three, then never ran again.
customer_reviews.author: Tejanogrande

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Not keeping time. Had it 1 month I need to exchange for a new one that works. Should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Sarti

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works very well
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this clock for our covered back porch a few months ago and it is performing perfectly. It's also a nice size to read from a distance in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: An attractive easy to read clock
customer_reviews.text: It is quite eye-catching. It is easy to read and the numbers are big enough where you can read them up to 20-30 feet away. I would recommend this clock for an outdoor space.
customer_reviews.author: Lynney

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor clock I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it! Larger than most clocks I found on amazon and easy to read. I really like the look of it too. It’s accurate and seems durable. It’s been outside for about a month and all is good!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clock if you can hang it in a shady area
customer_reviews.text: The clock keeps great time period however I could not hang it except in the direct sunlight The temperature and humidity gages really don't function Well except in the shade
customer_reviews.author: Papabear Barry

customer_reviews.title: Finally-A Reliable Outdoor Clock
customer_reviews.text: After going through 3 outdoor clocks sold by a high end retailer, I decided to give your clock a try. It's an attractive addition to our deck. More importantly, it has been keeping very good time. Others in the past were problematic. Good value for the money. Happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock
customer_reviews.text: Just received our clock this week. Looks good. I have it placed outside under the eaves of my home. I will have to see how it performs in weather extremes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: The clock is very nice looking and keeps perfect time
customer_reviews.text: The clock is very nice looking and keeps perfect time.... but the thermometer does not state the correct temperature at all. That part of my clock is broken. The humidistat works.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in January and didn’t put it outside until May when the weather got nicer. It kept time in the beginning but it hasn’t kept the correct time for about 3 weeks now. I have to reset it everyday, it loses at least 20 minutes a day (and yes, i have replaced the batteries twice). Unfortunately since I purchased this in January I missed my return window. I thought if I paid for a good clock it would keep time, but no. I am very disappointed.... grrrrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Karen

product_meta.title: Outdoor Clocks with Thermometer and Hygrometer - 18 Inch Silent Battery Operated Metal Clock,Wall Decorative for Patio,Pool and Home - Bronze
feature_bullets: [ANALOG HYGROMETER & THERMOMETER] - The SkyNature 18” outdoor clocks measures temperatures from -10 to 130 degrees Fahrenheit,and Humidity readings from 0% to 99% RH.
[INDOOR & OUTDOOR USE] - Designed to be hung outdoors with its UV & Weather-Resistance, or use indoors to decor your den,living room or office.

[QUALITY MATERIALS] - Solid metal frame with glass lens & metal hands. The clocks operates on one AA batteries (not included) to help keep the clocks precision Quartz movement. It offers silent non-ticking, sweeping movement mechanism.

[LARGE EASY TO VIEW FACE] - Clock measures 18" high by 18" wide by 2-1/2" deep. The clock face features 1-1/6-inch high numbers for easy visibility. High torque clock mechanism with metal hands tick off the hours and minutes.Integrated hang hole provides effortless wall clock mounting.

[12 MONTHS HAPPINESS GUARANTEE] - If you are unhappy with this clock for any reason, contact us within 90 days for a full refund or replacement. There's also a 365 day quality guarantee against defective parts.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,045 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
